BLINDFEAR:::

"I'm exploring" replied by com link the blindbot"my circuits said 
that small base is around... perhaps if we have some decepticons in 
good shape we can attack it and take some prisioners to reprogram 
them or exchange them as ramsom... what do you think Soundwave??? do 
you think that Megatron will be agree with that idea?"



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> --- Switchblade / Soundwave / Cassettes ---
> 
> Spasstik enters the lounge area and sits down in the corner of the 
> room. He eyes Frenzy and Rumble, who were already there, and then 
> proceeds lie down, eye's closed.
> 
> Frenzy frowns, "I'm bored... I wanna kick some autocrap around. 
> Wait, wait, wait... grrr, that's all we do here." He stands up and 
> begins to pace.
> 
> Rumble's eyes narrow at the though of destruction, and he 
> smiles. "Lets find Soundwave, maybe he's got something for us." 
> Frenzy nods, Spasstik perks up, and all three bots head for the 
> control room.
> 
> ----------------------------------------
> 
> Switchblade grins maliciously as he picks up the damaged Megatron 
in 
> gun form. "Megsy, never thought I'd see you in this position this 
> soon... no matter, I'll just make the bes--" Megatron 
> coughs, "Switchblade, you fool. Fix me and I shall reward you 
> greatly!"
> 
> The small dark bot laughs, his eyes glowing green with intent. "Now 
> why, Megsy, do I doubt your words... Ah well, I won't have to 
listen 
> to anything you say anymore." Megatron utters his final words, "No, 
> don't you ca--" as Switchblade disables Megatron's ability to 
> transform, and to speak, thus rendering the once great bot trapped 
> quite effectively. "Megsy, so sad... or not!" He spends some time 
> repairing the weapon, changing the colour, modifying the design a 
> little, camoflauging the once mighty Decepticon commander. The end 
> result is a sleek red and black hand pistol, with a particularly 
> menacing look to it.
> 
> Switchblade then moves over to Firestrike and continues working on 
> the larger fire oriented minion of his. He attaches the final arm 
to 
> Firestrike, with a little modification: A pistol size slot on the 
> inside of his arm, and a little mechanism that pops the pistol into 
> Firestrike's arm. He then places the pistol into the slot, hidden 
> from view. In addition to the pistol, and his orginal weapons, 
> Firestrike had also been equiped with an enhanced flamethrower. 
This 
> bot would be a significantly dangerous enemy to face, as long as he 
> didn't do too much thinking.
> 
> His eyes casting an evil glow around the room, Switchblade utters 
> several words that signify the starting of a revolution. "Arise, 
> Firestrike."
> 
> ----------------------------------------
> 
> Meanwhile, in the control room of the Dark Avian, Soundwave is 
> conversing with his most cassettes, minus Switchblade.
> 
> "Rumble, Frenzy. No hostile activity has been detected yet, and 
> also, we're awaiting the recovery of Megatron."
> 
> Rumble shrugs, "I guess we're waiting till something happens... 
> SLAG, I hat waiting..." He flops down on the floor, and stretches 
> himself out. Frenzy leans against the wall, and Spasstik sits 
> obediantly at Soundwave's feet. Soundwave opens a commlink to 
> Blindfear, "Blindfear, what is your status? Soundwave out." He 
> awaits an answer, totally unaware of what is coming...
